Context: The School of Mechanical Engineering at George Brown College offers a wide variety of industries for mechanical engineering careers including aerospace, automotive, telecommunications, health, and entertainment. The programs take an experiential approach to learning with access to the latest technology and facilities. Students may transfer between programs during the first semester. Industry partnerships provide co-op placements, projects, financial aid through scholarships and donations. The college offers a free Entry Advising service for students. Information sessions are available where faculty and staff answer questions and give tours of classrooms, labs, and facilities. Contact information: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@georgebrown.ca, Social Media Hub. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
